We've an Event for You!

original:
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を最大で50消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき[BloodScissor]1を得る
[WhenUse] このスキルで[BloodDinner]を消耗できなければ、[Laceration]5, [HardenedBlood]1を得る
[WhenUse] 対象の[Laceration]が5以上なら、コイン威力 +1
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を最大で50消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき[BloodScissor]1を得る
[WhenUse] このスキルで[BloodDinner]を消耗できなければ、[Laceration]5, [HardenedBlood]1を得る
[WhenUse] 対象の[Laceration]が5以上なら、コイン威力 +1
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]을 최대 50 소모하여, 소모한 [BloodDinner] 10당 [BloodScissor] 1 얻음
[WhenUse] 이 스킬에서 [BloodDinner]을 소모하지 못했으면, [Laceration] 5, [HardenedBlood]을 1 얻음.
[WhenUse] 대상의 [Laceration]이 5 이상이면, 코인 위력 +1
EN:
[WhenUse] Consume up to 50 [BloodDinner]; gain 1 [BloodScissor] for every 10 [BloodDinner] consumed
[WhenUse] If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner] with this Skill, gain 5 [Laceration] and 1 [HardenedBlood].
[WhenUse] If target has 5+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1

KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] [Laceration] 3 부여
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [Laceration]

KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] [Laceration] 3 부여
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [Laceration]

KR:
재촉하지마
EN:
Don't Rush Me

original:
[WhenUse] 対象の[Laceration]が5以上なら、コイン威力 +1
[WhenUse] [BloodScissor]に比例して、マッチ威力 +1(最大3)
[HardenedBlood]1につきダメージ量 +7%(最大35%)
[EndSkill] [HardenedBlood]を全て消耗
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[WhenUse] 対象の[Laceration]が5以上なら、コイン威力 +1
[WhenUse] [BloodScissor]に比例して、マッチ威力 +1(最大3)
[HardenedBlood]1につきダメージ量 +7%(最大35%)
[EndSkill] [HardenedBlood]を全て消耗
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[WhenUse] 대상의 [Laceration]이 5 이상이면, 코인 위력 +1
[WhenUse] [BloodScissor]에 비례해서, 합 위력 +1 (최대 3)
[HardenedBlood]당 피해량 +7% (최대 35%)
[EndSkill] [HardenedBlood] 전부 소모
EN:
[WhenUse] If target has 5+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every [BloodScissor] (max 3)
Deal +7% damage for every [HardenedBlood] (max 35%)
[EndSkill] Consume all [HardenedBlood]
